"Looks like you're okay.":
"Thank goodness! When Dark Falz caught
you, we didn't know what to do..."
"I, for one, am quite happy to see you are all okay."

"Alas, we were unable to defeat Dark Falz...
Thanks entirely to my own unpreparedness. I'm sorry."

"We're moving forward with our next plan immediately.
I'd like you all to get some rest and wait for further details."

"And thank you...
For protecting Central City.
For protecting Halpha."
